msContents.summary: Majmūʻa (مجموعه): a volume containing several works

msItem.title: ʻIshqnāmah
عشقنامه
msItem.note: Selected couplets from themas̲navī-ʼi maʻnavī (مثنوی معنوی)ofJalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273,جلال الدين رومى

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Marghūb al-qulūb
مرغوب القلوب
msItem.note: A didactic mas̲navī poem on Sufism and ethics

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Gulshan-i vaḥdat
گلشن وحدت
msItem.note: A mystical mas̲navī, mainly in Turkish but including prose passages in Persian

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.textLang: Mainly in Turkish with prose in Persian

msItem.title: Az guftah-ʼi Shams-i Tabrīzī
از گفتۀ شمس تبریسی
msItem.note: Ghazals misattributed toShams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247,شمس تبريزى ; some possible byJalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273جلال الدين رومى

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Suʼāl-i Jallā al-Dīn (sic) va javāb-i ʻIzz al-Dīn
سؤال جلا الدین و جواب عز الدین
msItem.note: Questions and answers, in verse, on aspects of Sufism

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Collection of poems
msItem.note: Poems byHumām, Muḥammad ibn Farīdūn, 1238?-1314 or 15,همام، محمد بن فريدون ;Niẓāmī Ganjavī, 1140 or 41-1202 or 3,نظامى گنجوى ;ʻAbd al-Razzāq,عبد الرزاق ;Khāqānī, Afz̤al al-Dīn Shirvānī, ca. 1126-1198 or 9,خاقانى ، افضل الدين شروانى ; andSanāʼī al-Ghaznavī, Abū al-Majd Majdūd ibn Ādam, d. ca. 1150,سنايى غزنوى، ابو المجد مجدود ابن آدم

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Sharḥ-i Qaṣīdah-ʼi Yāftam-i Ḥaz̤rat-i Mawlānā
شرح قصیدۀ يافتم حضرة مولانا
msItem.note: Commentary in Turkish on a poem (actually a ghazal) attributed toJalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273جلال الدين رومى

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Collection of poems
msItem.note: Poems in Persian byḤāfiẓ, 14th cent.,‏حافظ ,Şahidî İbrahim Dede, 1470-1550,شاهدی ابراهيم دده ,Jalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273,جلال الدين رومى ,Sulṭān Valad, 1226-1312,سلطان ولد ,Shams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247,شمس تبريزى (attributed), the poem of four half-times byʻUnṣurī, Abū al-Qāsim Ḥasan, fl. 1009-1041,‏عنصرى، ابو القاسم حسن ,Farrukhī, ʻAlī ibn Jūlūgh, d. 1037 or 8,‏فرخى ، على بن جولوغ ,ʻAsjadī, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Manṣūr, d. 1040 or 41,‏عاسجدی، عبد العزیز بن منصور ,Firdawsī,‏فرداوسى ; and poems by various Turkish poets

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Dar bayān-i āfāq-i anfusī-ʼi Ḥaz̤rat-i Mawlānā
در بیان آفاق انفسی حضرت مولانا
msItem.note: A tract on the cosmological symbolism of the planets
Unconnected withJalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273,جلال الدين رومي، مولانا،

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Sharḥ-i ghazal-i Ḥāfiẓ
شرح غزل حافظ
msItem.note: Commentary on a ghazal ofḤāfiẓ, 14th cent.,‏حافظ

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Poems, in Persian, Turkish, or Arabic
msItem.note: The Persian verses are byʻAyyānī (sic),‏عيانی ,Ḥāfiẓ, 14th cent.,‏حافظ ,,Asīrī,‏اسیری ,Jāmī, 1414-1492,جامى ,Kemalpaşazade, 1468 or 9-1534,ابن كمال باشا ,Sulṭān Valad, 1226-1312,سلطان ولد ,Shāhī,‏شاهى ,Shams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247,شمس تبريزى (attributed),Karrāq-i Jangī,‏کراق جنگی , and several naʼts, unattributed

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Poems in Persian
msItem.note: Poems byJāmī, 1414-1492,جامى , verses byṢāʼib Tabrīzī, Muḥammad ʻAlī, d. ca. 1670,‏صائب تبريزي، ميرزا محمد علي , and a rubāʻī

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Suʼāl va javāb dar bārah-ʼi Ḥadīs̲-i Kuntu kanzan makhfīyan
سعال و جواب در بارۀ حديث کنت کنزن مخفین
msItem.note: A treatise on the saying, often cited as a Ḥadīs̲ Qudsī,”I was a hidden treasure”

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.note: A ghazal in Persian and some Turkish verses

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.note: Brief tracts, and an anonymous commentary on a bayt byJāmī, 1414-1492,جامى

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.note: Selected verses from theMas̲navī-i maʻnavī (مثنوى معنوى), ofJalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273,رومي جلال الدين محمد بن محمد مولانا

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Bulbulnāmah
بلبلنامه
Risālah-ʼi bulbulnāmah
رسالۀ بلبلنامه
msItem.note: A Sufi mas̲navī
Incorrectly attributed toʻAṭṭār, Farīd al-Dīn, d. ca. 1230,عطار، فريد الدين ,
Main title has been supplied by Waley 1998, page 58.

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 58.

msItem.title: Futuvvatnāmah dar ṭālib-i Ḥaqq
فتوتنامه در طالب حق
msItem.note: A mystical mas̲navī poem

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Qalandarnāmah
قلندرنامه
msItem.note: A Sufi mas̲navī

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Dar bayān-i intikhāb-i Mas̲navī-i Mawlavī
در بیان انتخاب مثنوى مولوی
msItem.note: Selected lines from theMas̲navī-i maʻnavī (مثنوى معنوى), , ofJalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273,رومي جلال الدين محمد بن محمد مولانا , withTurkish commentary

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Rawshanā’ī nāmah
روشنائینامه
msItem.note: A philosophical mas̲navī poem

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Dīvān-i Maghribī
دیوان مغربی
msItem.note: Collected lyric poems of Muḥammad Shīrīn Maghribī, d. 809/146-7

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Dīvān-i Maghribī
دیوان مغربی
msItem.note: Collected lyric poems of Muḥammad Shīrīn Maghribī, d. 809/146-7

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 41.

msItem.title: Vaṣāyā-yi Khwāja ʻAbd al-Khāliq Ghujduvānī
وصاياى خواجه عبد الخالق غجدوانی
msItem.note: Counsels on Sufism

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Untitled
msItem.note: Poems, mainly in Turkish
Persian verses byJāmī, 1414-1492,جامى , inf. 133r, misattributed verses toShams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247,شمس تبريزى , inf. 133v, and unattributed inf. 135v

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Assorted qiṭaʻāt, mufradāt, and ghazals
msItem.note: Some of the poems are in Persian, others in Turkish

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Collection of poems
msItem.note: Poems or couplets bySulṭān Valad, 1226-1312,سلطان ولد , ,Ṣāʼib Tabrīzī, Muḥammad ʻAlī, d. ca. 1670,‏صائب تبريزي، ميرزا محمد علي , inf. 198r-199v, a naʻt inf. 200rbyNaẓīrī, d. 1613,نظيرى نيشاپوری , misattributed verses toShams-i Tabrīzī, d. 1247,شمس تبريزى , inf. 200v; and numerous Turkish poets

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

msItem.title: Bī sarnāmah
بی سرنامه
msItem.note: A Sufi mas̲navī formerly attributed, as here, to Farīd al-Dīn ʻAṭṭār

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 59.

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on M. I. Waley: Supplementary handlist of Persian manuscripts, 1966-1998. London, 1998 and G.M. Meredith-Owens: Handlist of Persian Manuscripts, 1895-1966. Oxford, 1968

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card for admissions procedures contactBritish Library, Registering for a Reader Pass). Contactapac-enquiries@bl.ukfor further information on the availability of this manuscript
